医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
益生菌 LGG 可降低早产儿坏死性小肠结肠炎风险通过对随机对照试验 (RCT) 和非 RCT 的系统评价和荟萃分析，研究鼠李糖乳杆菌 GG (LGG) 对早产儿的菌株特异性影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Probiotic-LGG-reduces-necrotizing-enterocolitis-risk-in-preterm-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Probiotic-LGG-reduces-necrotizing-enterocolitis-risk-in-preterm-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b9cdb99-547b-45c4-9872-e0c6bda3783b Wed, 31 Jul 2024 05:12:00 -0400 Probiotic LGG reduces necrotizing enterocolitis risk in preterm infants
患有牛奶过敏的青少年的乳制品消费量与同龄人相当是否有在婴儿期对牛奶过敏但现在对牛奶有耐受性的青少年。继续减少乳制品的消费量https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Adolescents-with-cows-milk-allergy-show-comparable-dairy-conspiration-to-peers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Adolescents-with-cows-milk-allergy-show-comparable-dairy-conspiration-to-peers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=458cf0f4-9d37-41af-b59a-9f4c8b2dbf6a Wed, 31 Jul 2024 03:57:00 -0400 Adolescents with cow's milk allergy show comparable dairy consumption to peers
适用于透射成像应用的新型 smartStage™ 开放式框架定位平台隆重推出 SmartStage™ 开放式框架定位平台，这是 Dover Motion 凭借 60 多年无与伦比的精密运动设计和制造专业知识实现的突破性创新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-smartStagee284a2-open-frame-positioning-stage-for-transmissive-imaging-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-smartStagee284a2-open-frame-positioning-stage-for-transmissive-imaging-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=534a09ae-4447-4aa8-b127-11959c3e172f Wed, 31 Jul 2024 03:40:00 -0400 New smartStage™ open frame positioning stage for transmissive imaging applications
研究揭示盲人的个性化大脑连接乔治城大学神经科学家领导的一项研究表明，视力正常的人接收和处理视觉信息的大脑部分在先天失明的人中形成了独特的连接模式。他们说初级视觉皮层的这种模式对每个人来说都是独一无二的——；类似于指纹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-personalized-brain-connectivity-in-blind-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-personalized-brain-connectivity-in-blind-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c91f3a92-6c83-4b25-8f89-3cd522fc27cd Wed, 31 Jul 2024 01:05:28 -0400 Study reveals personalized brain connectivity in blind individuals
高分辨率脑图揭示健康衰老的血管蓝图健康的血管不仅仅对心脏健康很重要。宾夕法尼亚州立大学研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，血管健康对于大脑健康至关重要，并且可能有助于解决与年龄相关的认知能力下降和阿尔茨海默病等神经退行性疾病。研究结果表明，大脑血管网络可能发挥着尚未充分研究的关键作用；或能源基础设施-；在神经退行性疾病的发作中发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/高分辨率-brain-maps-reveal-angio-blueprint-for-healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/高分辨率-brain-maps-reveal-angio-blueprint-for-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=300769af-b4c1-43b6-a708-18d77640dc20 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 00:49:49 -0400 High-resolution brain maps reveal vascular blueprint for healthy aging
量子模拟推动药物开发突破由墨尔本大学理论家和高性能计算专家 Giuseppe Barca 副教授领导的一个研究小组首次实现了生物系统的量子模拟，其规模达到了精确模拟药物性能所需的规模。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Quantum-simulation-drives-breakthrough-in-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Quantum-simulation-drives-breakthrough-in-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bd2dfc9-8323-44d5-96f0-aba3f7d7c0c0 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 00:33:37 -0400 Quantum simulation drives breakthrough in drug development
专业药物管理改善老年患者的护理弗林德斯大学与弗林德斯医疗中心合作进行的最新研究表明，确保老年医院患者接受专门的药物管理可以减少他们的住院时间，并可能降低他们的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Specialized-medication-management-improves-care-for-elderly-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Specialized-medication-management-improves-care-for-elderly-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c80a0c3c-ecd8-490a-a0e1-25f431cdf8cd Wed, 31 Jul 2024 00:21:27 -0400 Specialized medication management improves care for elderly patients
COVID-19 对洛杉矶县的长期心理健康影响不平等《PLOS ONE》杂志最近的一项研究表明，关于洛杉矶县 COVID-19 大流行的长期影响出现了新的证据。南加州大学和洛杉矶县公共卫生部 (DPH) 的科学家发现，白人和非白人居民之间现有的心理健康差距进一步恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Long-term-mental-health-impacts-of-COVID-19-unequal-in-LA-county.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Long-term-mental-health-impacts-of-COVID-19-unequal-in-LA-county.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc5552fc-739a-4fdc-b8fb-2324cc31a3c4 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 00:04:37 -0400 Long-term mental health impacts of COVID-19 unequal in LA county
饮食可以改变你的生理年龄吗？研究表明，健康饮食可以降低表观遗传年龄，而添加糖会加速中年黑人和白人女性的衰老。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Can-diet-alter-your-biological-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Can-diet-alter-your-biological-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c40aadb0-66fd-498d-8dce-23601fb51fc5 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 00:02:00 -0400 Can diet alter your biological age?
创新的组织切片方法可改善临床结果中国南京鼓楼医院赵元金领导的研究团队在《工程》杂志上发表了一篇研究论文，这是生物医学领域的一项开创性发展。这篇题为“基于分层磁性微针阵列机器人的可控组织切开术”的文章介绍了一种组织切片和培养的新技术，该技术可能会彻底改变临床环境中处理原发组织的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Innovative-tissue-slicing-method-for-improved-clinical-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Innovative-tissue-slicing-method-for-improved-clinical-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a15675b-dd89-4639-a296-078931730d8c Tue, 30 Jul 2024 23:58:00 -0400 Innovative tissue slicing method for improved clinical outcomes
